Module org.example
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.events

Interface Event

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AvailableCellsUpdate, AvailableChoicesUpdate, AvailableGodsEvent, BoardUpdate, ChallengerSelectionEvent, ChangeViewEvent, GameEndUpdate, GameInformationEvent, GameStartedEvent, GodSelectionEvent, LoginEvent, PhaseUpdate, PingEvent, PlayerLostUpdate, SelectedGodsEvent, UserInputEvent, WarningEvent, WorkerSelectionEvent
public interface Event
extends java.io.Serializable
This interface is used to implement the visitor pattern, every specific event overrides a visit function it's going to use and implements Event
